title: Get Help from Healer Nettie
content:
help and asking for your symptoms. This will give you the following dialogue options.

It 'might'? What aren't you telling me? I can merge my mind with anyone else that's infected. I fell from a ship in the sky, but something caught me. It saved my life. No, nothing strange, I just want it out of my head.

Choosing dialogue 1 will reveal that Nettie wants to help but needs more information. This will give players the same dialogue options to choose from again. Choosing dialogue 2 will interest N
